message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested but $180 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $140?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $140 is still outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $120, which is still a good deal for you.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $130?
Alice, I'm really trying to stay within my budget here.  $120 is the absolute highest I can go.  Let's make a deal!
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. I'll meet you at $125. This is my final offer, though.
